page.title: 09LEISURE IN 1985
page.content:
Leisure in the 80's consists of {keeping fit and eating healthy food. To keep their bodies in shape,people are joining{sports clubs}while they are still young and are taking up {jogging.}Keeping fit is the trend and aerobic classes are popular.
In our area are a number of{football {clubs}and I belong to one called Curley Park who I play for between September and May. Girls can play{netball}or{hockey}for the school,and in summer both sexes can do{athletics.
There are about four{youth clubs around here and that is a common place for children from about 10-18 to {go.Discos}are also held about every two months and they are very popular for children.
